name: RetroWania
description:
RetroWania is a retrowave metroidvania 2.5D!

This prototype was created during the game jam, "Metroidvania Month 8 - Hosted by Falcon Nova". It contains only one level, which is not long (about 10 minutes maximum), but it allows you to see all mechanics, and "MetroidVania" style progression in the game. 

* Controls:

- Left Move: Q / A / Left Arrow

- Right Move: D / Right Arrow

- Jump: Z / W / Up Arrow

- Attack: Space bar

- Double Jump: in the air press a second time the jump button

- Wall Jump: when you collide against the wall, press the jump button, the character will jump on the other wall

/!\ Some of these actions described above are not available at the beginning, I won't spoil you which ones, I let you the surprise :) (even it is rather easy to guess them) /!\

* Credits - Audio:

- Music: "Sub-orbital Base" - AliceMako, link of the music below. Moreover, CC licensing terms are also available with this link, at the bottom right-hand corner, as you can see, it can be used since it is a non-commercial game:

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/894902

- Effect sounds are from the sonniss free royalty bank sounds of GDC 2019, here is the link:

https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc19/
